title: Metal ion transport: unveiling the difference of nanoplastics and microplastics in Chiromantes dehaani glucolipid metabolism
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00045E, Paper
Mingming Han, Yuanhao Yang, Zihan Zhou, Daming Li, Ji Liang, Chenxi Zhu, Tian Zhu, Yanshan Liu, Qichen Jiang, Weiwei Lv
Microplastic pollution has emerged as a prominent concern within the global environmental landscape, given its propensity for substantial accumulation in estuaries, thereby posing threats to both biodiversity and human food security.
